title: CHAMPION SELECT SCREEN BUG HAS GIVEN ME 3 PROBABTIONS
body:
the champion select screen bug that's going around has given me 3 probations and is now happening randomly and more frequently

i used to only get it when i selected the spell teleport, but now, whenever i accept a game and am brought into the champ select screen there's a chance of it happening

currently typing this as i wait for the probation to finish

replies.body:
Hey there,

Regarding the actual issue you're experiencing, this has been acknowledged by Riot and they're working on a fix, see [this](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/hprhLF4v-61-champion-select-bug-unable-to-select-champion-after-changing-summoner-spells) thread for more information and  how YOU can help speed up the fix.

Now onto the leaverbuster issue, unfortunately leaverbuster is an automated system and punishments through said system cannot be reversed, even when such issues occur. Please see the [leaverbuster FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) for more information on leaverbuster.
